item.title: Supreme Court to consider overturning Hawaii law regulating where guns can be carried

item.title: New Hampshire teen who killed sister-in-law and nephews could get 97 years in prison
item.description: Prosecutors argue a New Hampshire man deserves at least 97 years in prison for killing his sister-in-law and two nephews
